channel.title: Thomas Liddle DBA Web Site
channel.description: thomasliddledba.com is a resource for a collection of articles, videos, scripts, and resources that I want to share with SQL Server Database Administrators and developers.

item.title: 10 Minute DBA - Now Available
item.author: tliddle30@gmail.com
item.description: The 10 Minute DBA is a playlist for SQL Server Enthusiasts and Newbies to SQL Server. Weekly videos are posted for Beginners and Advanced users with topics ranging from Design to Demonstration of Features.

item.title: Changing Linked Server Passwords
item.author: tliddle30@gmail.com
item.description: A linked server in SQL Server allows users to query remote heterogenous servers. These servers can be database servers like SQL Server, Oracle, MySQL, etc. At times, administrators of those servers might have to change the password on a mapped login or it could be changed without your knowledge. You will see the error message below when this occurs.

item.title: Dynamic Data Masking
item.description: This video demonstration will educate you on how to implement Dynamic Data Masking and how to ALTER it.
